Articles.Content:
Just thought I'd log in and say "hello".

I first saw this program 2 years ago at a player meet for City of Heroes and liked the look of it, but didn't do any thing about it until now, as CoH has been killed I was looking for something to do and remembered Kerbal. So I downloaded and parted with a few pounds (Ã‚Â£).

I'm enjoying trying to get a rocket into orbit and more important back safely on Kerbal.

Thanks to the devs and moders for a great program and add ons.
